Template.text:
<html xmlns:ccd="http://www.concordion.org/2007/concordion">
<head> <link href="../concordion.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> </head>
<body> TODO: * Set this file's property as follows: Build Action: Embedded Resource Copy To Output Directory: Copy always * Create corresponding C# concordion test file the c# class name must be the same as the html name plus Test suffix e.g for FooBar.html the C# class name is FooBarTest and the file name is FooBarTest.cs
</body> </html>
